SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
This class represents the main application that initializes student objects, fills lists and maps with students, and launches the MVC architecture for managing student data.
Command
This enum represents different commands that can be performed in the application.
ControllerClass
ControllerClass represents the controller in the MVC (Model-View-Controller) or MVP (Model-View-Presenter) design pattern.
FileModelClass
This class represents a model for handling student data stored in a file.
iGetModel
This interface defines methods for getting and deleting student objects.
iGetView
This interface defines methods for displaying student information and prompting user input.
ModelClass
This class represents a simple model for handling student data in memory.
ModelClassHash
This class represents a model for handling student data using a Map for efficient lookup.
Person
This abstract class represents a Person with a name and age.
Student
This class represents a Student, which is a type of Person with an additional id and id generator.
ViewClass
This class represents a view for interacting with student data through console input and output.
ViewClassEng
This class represents a view for interacting with student data through console input and output in English.
